# **Selection Process for the University of Portsmouth**

This webpage is meant to provide all information to slection committee regarding my teaching and research abilities as a potential **Senior Lecturer in Terrestrial Ecology** at the School of Biological Sciences

## How to navigate this site

1. The *class outline* is offers a brief summary of the recorded class specifically prepared following the instruction given in the email recieved on Monday 28th June 2021: 
**"Explain the cause and effects of selected human impacts on the natural world and explore possible solutions for key environmental issues"**. The search committee will find introductory texts to the topics of the classroom, references, slides and the link for the recorded classrom in this section

2. In the section **Research Overview** evaluators will find the link to the presentatiion on my research overview and a brief description on my past, present and future research plans
